title: 多世界插件怎么解决传送别的世界创造变成生存

replies.author: MCLink
replies.txt_content: 给予需要的管理玩家mv.bypass.gamemode.*权限
提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 晓夜Port
replies.txt_content: 我一般直接给自己 * 权限。

replies.author: Nazhi-
replies.txt_content:
zysj:
    ==: MVWorld
    hidden: 'false'
    alias: '&a资源世界'
    color: WHITE
    style: NORMAL
    pvp: 'true'
    scale: '1.0'
    respawnWorld: ''
    allowWeather: 'true'
    difficulty: EASY
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
    entryfee:
      ==: MVEntryFee
      amount: '0.0'
      currency: '-1'
    hunger: 'true'
    autoHeal: 'true'
    adjustSpawn: 'true'
    portalForm: ALL
    gameMode: SURVIVAL 需要创造的世界改成creative即可
